item.title: Write REST Assured request and response to the log file
item.author: pawangaria@gmail.com (Pawan Garia)
item.description: Testing and validating REST services in any application are hard and confusing, especially in java. REST Assured brings the simplicity as we can easily use REST Assured Java API’S to send the Request and then validate anything from the response. But while doing this simple request and response I face the problem now and again is how to configure REST Assured logs to be written to some file or test logs instead of printed to the console.
